reviewText: An outstanding compilation of historic footage that covers the first Golden Age of the National (Championship) Air Races

The National Air Races held between 1929 and 1949 collectively represent one of the most significant events in U. S. civil aviation history. This remarkable DVD tells the whole story, using an exceptional assortment of period photos and films, highlighted by an excellent narration. The organization is very imaginative, and permits viewers with an interest in the events of a specific year to select their area of interest.
This is an outstanding concise history of a very colorful era.
